inlineContent.text: VigramSDK is a library to connect your app to viDoc to retrieve location data and perform laser distance recordings.

EnvironmentDataService can be used to observe or record all positioning and device motion information around the device.
CoordinateCorrection specifies the correction of a raw antenna coordinate to the position that is observed in a given recording.
NtripConnectionInformation combines all connection data needed to connect to an NTRIP server besides the necessary mountpoint.
A DeviceMotionService can be used to keep track of the orientation and gravity information of the device.

instances to access NTRIP data.
A GGAMessage is used for location data and correction information.
A TXTMessage is used for user information.
